item.description:
Let's go to Fody's Tavern to see the Stone Blue Band.

About the Stone Blue Band:
We are a 6 piece cover band coming to you from the regions of Southern New Hampshire.

The Stone Blue Bandâ€™s influences are many.
We find our own distinct sound by combining the vast styling's of a mixed genre of legendary music.

Some would classify the band as: Classic, Southern, Rockin' Blues.

To put it simply The Stone Blue Band is raw ROCK-n-ROLL!!

http://www.stoneblueb...

About Fody's Tavern:
Come in, sit down and enjoy our classy, relaxed tavern atmosphere in downtown Nashua, NH. Our food is nothing short of mouthwatering. We look forward to meeting you in our fine restaurant!

Fody's Tavern features Live Music every Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday. Our cozy restaurant also promotes regular Comedy shows and special events.

Menu:
http://www.fodystaver...

Drink Menu:
http://www.fodystaver...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign.
item.name: Stone Blue Band @ Fody's Tavern
